label: AB4_mC20_15_e_2f-001
title: CrP$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
This is the high temperature form OsP$_{4}$ and RuP$_{4}$ (Fl\"{o}rke, 1982).  For the low temperature form see the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4_mP10_14_a_2e-001}{CdP$_{4}$ structure}. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B_mC20_15_2f_e-001}{OsO$_{4}$, A4B\_mC20\_15\_2f\_e-001}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4_mC20_15_e_2f-001}{CrP$_{4}$, AB4\_mC20\_15\_e\_2f-001}, occupy the same Wyckoff positions in space group $C2/c$ \#15. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with their own AFLOW labels and parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
